items.sentence: If we work as a team, we can achieve anything.
Tom said he\'s really sorry for what happened.
I spent the whole afternoon cleaning my house.
Tom lifted up his shirt and exposed his belly.
Tom is very close to his girlfriend\'s family.
Tom isn\'t going to take a vacation this year.
Tom isn\'t the kind of guy that would do that.
You took the cookies out of the oven too soon.
You can\'t believe anything Tom says about me.
Tom said you might be interested in this book.
